google_play_reviews.content: it was very good for old people
saw the launching screen but then closed automatically for Nokia 1
Best simple UI I tried so far. I think it is missing an option to make contacts the default page (instead of apps).

Keeps UI nice and simple with large icons, perfect for my Mum with failing eyesight. This has helped her not get overwhelmed and navigate her phone easily. She didn't want to use it when I mentioned the name Elder Launcher but quickly came around when she started using it. Maybe renaming it Simple launcher or similar will encourage more to use it?. Thanks Devs for this great App!
No ads, simple and perfact for elderly people. Good job bapu I m using this since 2021, it's doing great job
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad this app meets your expectations. Your encouraging words mean a lot, thank you.

google_play_reviews.content: The one thing we attempt to make easier for the aged is use. The app is great for limiting clutter on the desktop of the phone. The problem I see is that once the app is active there is no notification of WhatsApp messages that are received. You need to go into the app before you can tell that there is a message waiting for you. How will they know they have a message waiting?
This is the best launcher I've tried. Gets rid of all the unwanted stuff. I would have preferred the contacts to be on the home screen rather than the apps.
If the user has a little experience with phones, this is a snappy easy to use launcher. Nice.
Amazing! I love it. Wanted a simple phone for elder parents, and now I can get any phone and put this on it! Thanks
Awesome for my Dad. Recently, the contacts screen has been constantly hanging there, so it's unusable.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, have you tried restarting the phone? Sometimes it may help. If it doesn't please reach out to me on aj@arjunsinh.dev (Details such as Android version and the phone model name) would help.

google_play_reviews.content: Good
I found it looking for an app for my parents. One of many tested. The chosen one, so far. I am using it also for me.

Best home screen app for people who have never used feature or smartphone - especially very elderly and those with learning disability. One suggestion - if you could add a setting/option by which the contact gets called immediately on touching ( without the popup showing number and call button) it will be even more friendlier for very elderly people with no knowledge of multi-level user interfaces.
this is the people who make a difference in the world
Looks very promising! The only thing that I miss is the possibility to use a language other than english for the user interface. Good job!
Restored my father's ability to use a phone during the final moths of his life. Thanks for being there for him.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm deeply touched. This app only serves to help people, thank you for sharing.

google_play_reviews.content: Love your app! Wish I could edit names on the tiles. But it is a wonderful launcher for us old folks üòÅ
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I'm glad you like the app. What names would you like to change? App names or contact names?

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent app fo elders and psychiatric patients Note 1. Behaves erratic on opening app again and also in cascade windows button 2. Call should be connected directly from icon 3. No search type bar. Has to scroll for choosing favs 4. Reordering of main tabs as elders mostly uses call option. 6. Keep 3 4 screens/tabs namely calling (priority 1), most used apps, bank apps (keep customisable). 7. Automatic screen rotation should be disabled.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for the detailed feedback. Tapping a contact tile opens a quick menu which in the future will allow SMS and internet calls too. An extra tap also reduces accidental calls. Also, significant amount of senior users open apps more frequently than calls. I will look into reordering tabs, screen rotation and other concerns. Thanks! üòÄüëç

google_play_reviews.content: Name of app isn't very appropriate. Not all seniors have vision problems. Im 51 and I have. I need +2.75 reading glasses just to use this app. But helps much if I lose glasses.
A very useful app. Even tho I am not an elder üíØ cool üòé
I wish FONT size could be larger for the typewriter
Great , very simple
Very good.

I think this is the best app for simplifying the home screen for older people so far. The only thing is I wish it had notification dots on the apps, or just put the notifications on the screen so you have to read them before you can go back to the home screen.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your suggestion. Notification dots would be a nice feature. Sadly, Android requires users to do complex steps before apps get notification access. I'll have to do it such that seniors installing this app by themselves are not overwhelmed. In the meanwhile, android notifications panel is still at the top to view notifications.

google_play_reviews.content: Amazing app.i will highly recommend this app for senior citizens.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your encouraging words.

google_play_reviews.content: just need a phone nubmer under contats and or a tap to pick and sms
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for providing feedback. I have noted your suggestion.

google_play_reviews.content: Hide app function not given
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Elder Launcher is supposed to be a simple launcher. There is a real possibility that some users can accidentally hide essential apps and then become unable to get them back. I hope you understand the reasoning. Have a nice day.

google_play_reviews.content: Contacts not working, please add support to make calls by clicking on contact and calling through Google voice
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback.
When you touch the 'All Contacts' button is the contacts app not opening? Or are you unable to add your favourite contacts to the home screen?

google_play_reviews.content: The App looks good. I have a question. Is it possible to swap the "Apps" and "Contacts"? I want Contacts to be the default screen. It only allows me to add 3 favorite contacts. How do I add more?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There is no maximum limit to favourite apps or contacts. To add more favourite contacts, do this: 1. Touch Contacts tab 2. Touch the pencil icon at the top right corner to view edit menu. 3. Touch "Add/Remove Favourite contacts" and a list of all installed apps will appear. 4. Tick all contacts you want on your home screen. 5. Touch save to finish.

google_play_reviews.content: Superrrrr love this app because my grand maa use this app ü§óüòòüòáüòôüòÅüòâüòâüòâüòâ
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad this app helps your grandmother. Thank you for the 5 star rating!

google_play_reviews.content: This is a decent launcher for visually impaired. There are a couple improvements needed. If you use dark mode, often when going home, a white screen appears before seeing the home screen. No launcher should have a loading screen, but this does. I wish pressing home when on home screen would bring you to top of favorites. Instead, one must scroll to top to get to most used/important apps.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I will investigate why the white screen is appearing and will look into incorporating your other suggestions. Thank you for your continued feedback. I appreciate it.
